label: 為房卿記
本: Five Mountains: The Rinzai Zen Monastic Institution in Medieval Japan . Harvard University Press . 1981
見出し読み: ためふさ きょうき
見出し読み_mod: ためふさ きょうき
説明文: The diary of Fujiwara no Tamefusa (1049-1115), a mid-level Fujiwara who served as a retainer of Go-Sanjo snd Shirakara. Though the diary originally covered the years from 1072 to 1104, many sections have been lost. The entries for the year 1081 are among the most extensive.
